# gitfind 🔍

A Python package to find and analyze any public GitHub repository URL, generating a detailed report.

## Features

- ⭐ Total Stars
- 🍴 Total Forks  
- 👨‍💻 Total Contributors
- ⏳ Last Commit Date
- 🖥️ Primary Programming Languages
- 📝 Auto-generated summary report

## Installation

```bash
pip install gitfind
